name: Japan
interesting_facts: Japan is made up of over 6,800 islands.
The Japanese train system is known for its punctuality and speed.
Tokyo is the largest metropolitan area in the world by population.
Japan has the world's oldest continuous monarchy, dating back over 1,500 years.

name: Brazil
interesting_facts: Brazil is the largest country in South America by both area and population.
It is home to the Amazon Rainforest, which produces 20% of the world's oxygen.
Brazil has won the FIFA World Cup five times, the most by any country.
The official language of Brazil is Portuguese, unlike most other countries in South America.

name: Egypt
interesting_facts: Egypt is home to the ancient pyramids, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.
The Nile River, which flows through Egypt, is the longest river in the world.
Cairo is one of the largest cities in Africa and the Arab world.
Egypt has a rich history of civilization dating back over 5,000 years.

name: Canada
interesting_facts: Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.
It is home to the second-largest land area in the world, after Russia.
Canada has two official languages: English and French.
It is known for its beautiful natural landscapes, including national parks and lakes.

name: Australia
interesting_facts: Australia is the only country that is also a continent.
It is home to the Great Barrier Reef, the largest coral reef system in the world.
Australia has more than 10,000 beaches, more than any other country.
It is one of the driest inhabited continents on Earth, with much of its land being desert.

name: France
interesting_facts: France is known for its rich history, culture, and cuisine, especially wine and cheese.
The Eiffel Tower in Paris is one of the most visited paid monuments in the world.
France was the birthplace of the French Revolution in 1789.
It is the most visited country in the world with over 80 million tourists each year.

name: India
interesting_facts: India is the world's largest democracy.
It is home to the Taj Mahal, one of the Seven Wonders of the World.
India has over 2,000 distinct languages and dialects.
Yoga, one of the world's most popular fitness practices, originated in India over 5,000 years ago.

name: South Africa
interesting_facts: South Africa has three capital cities, each serving a different governmental purpose.
It is home to the famous Kruger National Park, one of Africa's largest game reserves.
South Africa is the only country to have hosted the FIFA World Cup on the African continent.

name: Mexico
interesting_facts: Mexico is home to one of the oldest civilizations in the Americas, the Aztecs.
It has the second-largest number of Spanish speakers in the world, after Spain.
Mexico has a rich cultural heritage, including mariachi music and vibrant festivals like Día de los Muertos.
Chichen Itza, one of the most famous ancient ruins, is located in Mexico.
